Flooring: Flooring: Any gaps observed between door frame & flooring / skirting

Windows/Ventillator: Windows / Ventilator: Any windows frame & shutters bend / damaged?

Handrails/MS Grills: Handrails / MS grills: Painting to hand railing / grills done
